all_text_timv: Muchamore, Robert. Man vs. beast / Robert Muchamore. Man v. beast Man versus beast 1st Simon Pulse hardcover ed. New York : Simon Pulse, 2013. ©2006 322 pages ; 22 cm. text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier CHERUB ; mission 6 Originally published: London : Hodder Children's Books, 2006. When a new radical animal protection group argues that it is right to kill or threaten one human in order to save the lives of many animals, James and the other agents must try to stop the group from completing a violent mission. Ages 12 & up. Spies Fiction. Animals Treatment Fiction. Adventure and adventurers Fiction. Spy stories. Animals Treatment Fiction. Adventure stories. Spy stories. Adventure stories. Young adult fiction. Muchamore, Robert. CHERUB ; mission 6.
